Serialized Form

  • Package thatslife

    • Class thatslife.ActionCard extends thatslife.Card implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • allPlayers
          java.util.ArrayList<thatslife.Player> allPlayers
          This attribute contains the ArrayList of all players in the game.
        • AMOUNT
          double AMOUNT
          This attribute contains the card's monetary value, to be used by its events.
        • NAME
          java.lang.String NAME
          This attribute contain's the player's name.
        • TYPE
          int TYPE
          This attribute contains the card's type, which ranges for the following values: 0 - Make the player collect from the bank this card's value 1 - Make the player pay the bank this card's value 2 - Make the player pay another player this card's value 3 - Make the player collect money from another player this card's value

    • Class thatslife.ActionDeck extends thatslife.Deck implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • beforeShuffle
          thatslife.ActionCard[] beforeShuffle
          This attribute holds all the ActionCards before they were shuffled.

    • Class thatslife.BlueCard extends thatslife.Card implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • amount
          double amount
          This attribute contains the card's monetary value, which is generated according to the "lawsuit" specification in the Machine Project specifications.
        • matchingCareer
          java.lang.String matchingCareer
          This attribute contains a string of the career name that this card matches with.
        • NAME
          java.lang.String NAME
          This attribute contains the card's name, which is defined outside of this class.
        • players
          java.util.ArrayList<thatslife.Player> players
          This attribute contains the ArrayList of the players.

    • Class thatslife.CareerCard extends thatslife.Card implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • DEGREE
          boolean DEGREE
          This attribute holds the classification of the career, if it needs a degree or not.
        • maxRaise
          int maxRaise
          This attribute holds the career's maximum number of times it can have a Pay Raise. This value is randomly generated based on the career given, which is based from the Machine Project specifications.
        • NAME
          java.lang.String NAME
          This attribute holds the name of the career

    • Class thatslife.MagentaSpace extends thatslife.Space implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • allPlayers
          java.util.ArrayList<thatslife.Player> allPlayers
          This attritute holds the main instance for the players ArrayList.
        • TYPE
          int TYPE
          This attribute stores the type of MagentaSpace this instance is. Types are: 0 - College Career Choice 1 - Job Search 2 - Buy House 3 - Get Married 4 - Have Baby 5 - Have Twins 6 - Graduation 7 - Career Choice

    • Class thatslife.Map extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • endSpace
          thatslife.EndSpace endSpace
          This attribute stores the very last space (retirement space) of the game.
        • paths
          java.util.ArrayList<thatslife.Path> paths
          This attribute stores all the paths for the game.
        • startSpace
          thatslife.StartSpace startSpace
          This attribute stores the very first space (player insertion point) of the game.

    • Class thatslife.Path extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • destinationSpace
          thatslife.Space destinationSpace
          This attribute stores the last space of the path.
        • name
          java.lang.String name
          This attribute stores the path name.
        • originSpace
          thatslife.Space originSpace
          This attribute stores the first space of the path.
        • spaces
          java.util.ArrayList<thatslife.Space> spaces
          This attribute holds all of the spaces that belong to this path.

    • Class thatslife.Player extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • balance
          double balance
          This attribute holds the player's money balance.
        • career
          thatslife.CareerCard career
          This attribute holds the player's current career card.
        • children
          int children
          This attribute holds the value for how many children the player has.
        • graduate
          boolean graduate
          This attribute holds the boolean value of the player's graduation status.
        • house
          thatslife.HouseCard house
          This attribute holds the player's house, if he owns one.
        • loan
          double loan
          This attribute holds the player's total loan value including the interest.
        • playerID
          int playerID
          This attribute holds this player's ID.
        • playerName
          java.lang.String playerName
          This attribute holds the player's name.
        • salary
          thatslife.SalaryCard salary
          This attribute holds the player's current salary card.
        • space
          thatslife.Space space
          This attribute holds the space where the player is currently on.
        • spouse
          boolean spouse
          This attribute holds the a boolean value that tells if the player is married or not.
        • transactions
          java.util.ArrayList<Transaction> transactions
          The list of the player's transactions.

    • Class thatslife.SalaryCard extends thatslife.Card implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • payRaise
          double payRaise
          This attribute holds the value for the pay raise amount to be added to the salary every pay raise. Pay Raise is obtained through a randomizer.
        • player
          thatslife.Player player
          This attribute holds the player instance.
        • raised
          int raised
          This attribute contains the number of times the player has done a Pay Raise.
        • salary
          double salary
          This attribute contains the player's current salary This is initially given as the constructor's parameter but this value can increase due to pay raises.
        • taxDue
          double taxDue
          This attribute contains the player's taxDue value. For this game, it is calculated by getting 10% of the given salary. Afterwards, every pay raise will increment this value by 2000.

    • Class thatslife.SalaryDeck extends thatslife.Deck implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • numCards
          int numCards
          This attribute holds the initial number of cards that this deck should have.

    • Class thatslife.Space extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • ID
          int ID
          This attribute stores this instance's space ID.
        • nextSpace
          thatslife.Space nextSpace
        • path
          thatslife.Path path
          This attribute stores the path where the space belongs.
        • players
          java.util.ArrayList<thatslife.Player> players
          This attribute stores the list of players standing on this space at a time.

    • Class thatslife.ThatsLife extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • actualDecks
          thatslife.Deck[] actualDecks
          The actual instances of all decks
        • firstMove
          int firstMove
          This attribute holds the integer that determines if all players have had their first turns already.
        • map
          thatslife.Map map
          This static final variable contains the main map instance of the entire game.
        • players
          java.util.ArrayList<thatslife.Player> players
          This attribute holds the instances of all the players.
        • turn
          int turn
          This attribute holds the current player who has the turn for the game.

    • Class thatslife.Transaction extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      22552965L

      • Serialized Fields

        • AMT
          double AMT
          The amount of the transaction. Negative value = debited, positive or zero = credited.
        • DESC
          java.lang.String DESC
          The description/purpose of the transaction.
        • ID
          int ID
          Is the unique integer ID of an instance of a transaction.
